SELECT c.*,s.name as student_name,t.name as teacher_name,m.name as manager_name FROM COMMENTS c left outer join student s on c.student_number=s.student_number left outer join teacher t on c.teacher_number=t.teacher_number left outer join managers m on c.manager_number=m.manager_number WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into comments(comment_number, teacher_number, notice_no, write_date, comment_con) values ((SELECT nvl(max(COMMENT_NUMBER), 0) + 1 FROM COMMENTS) , #{teacher_number}, #{notice_no}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), #{comment_con});
